author: Simon Difford
description: An alcoholic cream soda created for a friend who expressed a desire for just such a thing.
name: Cream Soda Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
